name: Trinidad Spell
description: In this tiki-inspired cocktail, a full ounce of bitters plays the starring role.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce Rothman + Winter Orchard Apricot liqueur
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed orange juice from 1 orange
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a shaker filled 2/3 with ice. Shake hard for 30 seconds to incorporate and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish according to your own inner tiki style.
